original_text: And all people of the earth shall see that thou art called by the name of the Lord; and they shall be afraid of thee.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 백성이 여호와의 이름이 너를 위하여 불리는 것을 보고 너를 두려워하리라

sentences.original_text: And all people of the earth shall see
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅의 모든 백성이 볼 것이라

sentences.original_text: that thou art called by the name of the Lord
and they shall be afraid of thee
